MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 8.14AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.32AM on 17 October 2020.
